entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Maple Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.4°C

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog dissipating near noon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 16 January 2023
